# Report

Компонент для отображения графиков.

## Props

|Component/Type  |  ReportType         | Specific Component Props    | HOC Props |
|----------------|---------------------|-----------------------------|-----------|
|Report          |  type, help         |  short, data, hasError, url |           |
|Preview         |  title, hint, wide  |  summary, url               | canView   |
